docs.title: ensembl-genes
docs.text:
Ensembl genes utilities and tools — project documentation

This repository provides tools and utilities used by Ensembl for genome annotation and related workflows. The documentation is produced with MkDocs.

Contents

  1. Install
  2. Usage

docs.title: Basic installation
docs.text:
To install the package from GitHub using pip:

pip install git+https://github.com/Ensembl/ensembl-genes.git

docs.title: Development installation
docs.text:
Create and activate a virtual environment, then install in editable mode:

python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
git clone https://github.com/Ensembl/ensembl-genes.git
pip install -e ensembl-genes/.[cicd,docs]

Documentation is generated with MkDocs. For usage information see the mkdocs.yml and the mkdocs/ directory.
